problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O OA = N_0, with point A as the center of the circle, and the length of OA as the radius, draw an arc to intersect ⊙O at B and C, then BC = ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示,AB=BO=AO,则△ABO为等边三角形,∴∠OBA=60°,根据相交两圆的连心线垂直平分公共弦,则BP=PC=\frac{1}{2}BC,∵△ABC为等边三角形,∴BC是∠OBA的平分线,∠OBC=30°．∴AP=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×3=\frac{3}{2}；在Rt△ABP中,AB=3,AP=\frac{3}{2},PB=√{AB²-AP²}=√{3²-(\frac{3}{2})²}=\frac{3√{3}}{2},∴BC=2PB=2×\frac{3√{3}}{2}=3√{3}；故选:B．
